1.Title: Beat of the Hammer
1.Description: After the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or her enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, quickly use a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to increase the Daze dealt by 15%.
1.Lore: Her fiery temper is just a facade. In reality, Koleda's thoughts are quite intricate. For example, she knows when to swing her hammer for a more painful strike.

2.Title: Kinetic Recovery
2.Description: When Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, she recovers 60 Energy. Can trigger once every 45s.
2.Lore:
Koleda believes perfect hammering has its own natural rhythm.
It's like tapping a tambourine, with each hit building up the tempo of the next beat.
Of course, it's hard to say how many taps her "toys" can endure.

3.Title: "Mind Your Own!"
3.Lore:
As a qualified "toy," you better not cause trouble when Koleda starts to get a feel for swinging her hammer. Just take the beating.
—After all, what's the point of resisting?

4.Title: Furnace's Glow
4.Description: Koleda gains one stack of Charge (max 2 stacks) when consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use her Enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Natural Disaster</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Hammerquake</color> hits an enemy, she consumes all stacks of Charge to increase the attack's DMG by 18% per stack.
4.Lore:
Koleda feels the flames of war as her hammer swings raise the surrounding temperature.
She's now even more flammable and explosive than Ether.

5.Title: "You Dare Underestimate Me?"
5.Lore: Koleda cares deeply about her role as a young leader potentially causing others to underestimate Belobog Heavy Industries. To compensate, she consistently trains diligently in secret.

6.Title: Saturated Blast
6.Description: When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> triggers an explosion that hits an enemy, it deals additional DMG equal to 360% of Koleda's ATK.
6.Lore:
There are two types of people that Koleda really hates:
Stupid people, and hopelessly stupid people.
Luckily for her, Belobog always has a good supply of strong Ether explosives — plenty to use on the stupid.

DescriptionByLevel.1: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.2: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>35%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.3: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.4: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>45%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.5: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.6: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>55%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.7: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color>.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Belobog Management
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction or is a <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

110100001.Title: Basic Attack: Smash 'n' Bash
110100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 strikes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When Koleda has the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect, she can launch an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> after the 2nd hit, consuming the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect and dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When Koleda and Ben are deployed together, executing an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> will trigger a coordinated attack from both, further increasing the move's power;
Koleda is invulnerable during the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack's</color> 4th hit and enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

110100002.Title: Special Attack: Hammer Time
110100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front and triggers an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
This skill launches faster and triggers an explosion when used after the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
When Koleda and Ben are both in your squad, and this skill is quickly launched after an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, they team up to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the skill.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

110100003.Title: EX Special Attack: Boiling Furnace
110100003.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front and triggers a powerful explosion, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Koleda also gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
This skill activates faster and triggers an explosion when used after the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
When Koleda and Ben are both in your squad and this skill is quickly launched after an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, they team up to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the skill.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110100004.Title: Dodge: Wait 'n' See
110100004.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110100005.Title: Dash Attack: Tremble!
110100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

110100006.Title: Dodge Counter: Don't Look Down on Me
110100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front and creates an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110110034.Title: Dodge Counter: Don't Look Down on Me

110100007.Title: Chain Attack: Natural Disaster
110100007.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful explosion on enemies in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> while also obtaining the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110100008.Title: Ultimate: Hammerquake
110100008.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful explosion on enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> while also obtaining the <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
Koleda and Ben can team up when fighting together to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110100010.Title: Quick Assist: Coming Thru!
110100010.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110100011.Title: Defensive Assist: Protective Hammer
110100011.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

110100012.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Hammer Bell
110100012.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Koleda charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> effect.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
